title: League bug can't click or use keyboard
body:
So I just got 5 20 min bans do to the fact that my league client wouldn't let me click or use my keyboard after I died at the 20 minute mark. This resulted in me leaving and rejoining 5 times to try to fix it every time I joined I couldn't click or use my keyboard and I was forced to task manger and force quit the program. This was a client side issue and I would greatly appreciate if the bans could be removed :) I then had to restart my computer at the end of the game to see if it would fix it but my computer is slow and I wasn't able to reconnect in time.

I also tested my keyboard and mouse and they where working properly.

replies.body:
Because disconnecting from a match negatively impacts everyone in it, regardless of intent, all disconnections are treated equally. This is also a prime reason as to why penalties cannot be modified or removed. It takes multiple disconnections to gain a 5x 20min low priority queue, as we understand that sometimes **stuff happens.**

Has this happened multiple times, or was this just a one-time thing?
